review: Buyer Beware! I am very unhappy with the level of Customer Service I have received regarding a problem with my Fire Stick.  I started with online chat, and after being passed through 3 different agents, I was then told I needed to get on a phone call.After I spent 10 minutes on the phone describing my problems with the Fire Stick  asking for a replacement under warranty, I was told I needed to be passed on to a different tech support individual who would help me.  That agent received incorrect information from the prior agent regarding my problem which meant I had to explain once again and continually repeat all the trouble shooting efforts I had made.My fire stick keeps losing the internet connection. The agent tried to tell me it was my bandwidth - however that would not explain why the fire stick had worked perfectly for 10 months and then started giving me problems 3 days ago.  The lack of understanding and empowerment from the agents is astounding. We're talking about a product that likely costs Amazon $5 to produce - and apparently it's not possible to send a loyal Prime customer a replacement rather than make me spend more than 30 minutes repeating the same information over and over again.After threatening to cancel my Prime membership, and spending a total of 45 minutes trying to resolve this, the agent finally said she would send a replacement Fire Stick. I don't know why it takes this level of pain to get support from Amazon that supposedly prides itself on customer service.
